overview: This is a story about 2 brothers, Jaiye and Juwon Kuti. Their relationship becomes estranged when the younger brother Juwon dropped out of school to pursue a music career. The story revolves around their conflicting lifestyles and the challenges between being highly educated but poor and less educated but very rich.
tagline: If Two Wrongs Make a Right, What do Two Rights Make?
title: Don't Get Mad Get Even
